name: Pong Effect (kiliandev)
description: I made this game because I was inspired from tetris effect and i liked the idea of an old game but with a new look into it so this is my try I hope you like it, it has two game modes the first one is a multiplayer game of pong and the second one is just a training mode if you dont want to play with anyone ,this is my first multiplayer game and I'm still learning so any feedback will be helpful thanks for playing!
